original: Berndt, Axel Wilhelm, redaktör, Nässjö, f. 22/1/84 i Kroppa, Värml. 1. G. 26 m. Ehsabeth Pettersson. — Skolstud. v. Kristineh. a. 1. 94-00. Medarb. i Ansgarii Posten fr. 02, red. o. ansv. utg. av Billingen 08, red. f. Jämtl. Kuriren 16, medarb. i Väst-mani. Nyh. 18, huvudred. 19, red. f. Näs’sjö Tidn. 24-42, piatsred. f. Små–landsbygdenis Tidn. s^ed. 42. Styr ided. i hemb:fören., kyrkobrödrakåren, led. av kyrkoråd, kyrkovärd is^ed. 45, m. m. Medl. av Publ :kl. fr. 18, av Östra Sv:es pressfören. fr. 23, av Sv. journ:-fören. fr. 05, Smål :krets. av Sv. journ’:-fören., av Fr|imurarorden o. Odd Fel-’iow.
translated: Berndt, Axel Wilhelm, editor, Nässjö, born January 22, 1884 in Kroppa, Värmland. Married in 1926 to Ehsabeth Pettersson. He studied at Kristinehamn school from 1894 to 1900. He worked for Ansgarii Posten from 1902, was editor and responsible publisher for Billingen in 1908, editor for Jämtl. Kuriren in 1916, worked for Västmanlands Nyheter in 1918, was the main editor in 1919, editor for Nässjö Tidning from 1924 to 1942, and was a local editor for Smålandsbygdens Tidning since 1942. He was involved in various local organizations such as home associations, the Church fraternity, and was a member of the Church Council. He was also a member of the Public Class from 1918, Östra Sweden's Press Association from 1923, Swedish Journalist Association from 1905, Small circuit of Swedish Journalist Association, Freemason and Odd Fellows.

memberOf.name: Small circuit of Swedish Journalist Association
